participant_1.name: Mia
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about music, Mia is driven by her dreams and enjoys sharing her interests with others.
participant_1.background: I have a french bulldog. I play bass. I want to be a journalist but instead I sell washers at Sears. I love the band Red Hot Chili Peppers. My feet are size six women's.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Active and sporty, Jordan is enthusiastic about outdoor activities and enjoys connecting with others through sports.
participant_2.background: My favorite sport is basketball. I am an avid runner. I live in Canada, near Ontario. My favorite basketball team is the Vancouver Grizzlies. I run marathons twice a year, mostly in America.

content.text: Hi!
Hello!
What do you do for fun?
I love to play basketball and run marathons!
Cool! I love to play bass and sing!
That's awesome! Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a French bulldog.
Aww! I love French bulldogs!
Me too! They're so cute and cuddly.
What do you do for work?
I sell washers at Sears, but I want to be a journalist.
That's interesting! What kind of journalist do you want to be?
I want to be a music journalist, so I can write about bands I love.
That's a great goal! I'm sure you'll achieve it.
Thanks! I hope so!
What's your favorite band?
My favorite band is the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
Oh, I love them! They're my favorite too!
We should go to a concert together sometime!
That would be awesome! I'd love to do that.
